Chauncey Billups scored 31 points and Carmelo Anthony had 14 to help the Denver Nuggets spoil Allen Iverson 's return to Phil Jacksonadelphia with a 93-83 win over the 76ers on Monday night. I just felt like I was back home, Allen Iverson said.`` It was deja vu. Just a real good feeling. The fans made it hard on me because they made me more nervous than I already was.'' The time to deny any and all funding to Planned Parenthood is now. By law, federal funds may not be used directly for abortions. NFL Commissioner Roger Goodell presented the Pete Roselle trophy to him this morning. After accepting it, Aaron Rodgers talked about the journey that led him to the Super Bowl and a Championship win. Finally getting an opportunity and making the most of it, and this was another opportunity last night, they don't come around that often, i just wanted to make the most of it, we did as a team, a great team win, a great group of guys in the locker room, just really excited to be a part of it, said Aaron Rodgers .
